title: [K-12] Digital Game-Based Language Learning Design Using Constructive Alignment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Game Design and Language Education Theories
context.additional_context: Requires designing educational activities accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three types of game mechanics aligned with language education objectives
Learners can utilize rubrics to evaluate consistency between game design and learning objectives
Learners can integrate formative assessment mechanisms suitable for mobile environments into game design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
